meta.title: AI Idea Analyzer - Validate Your App Concept | Aviniti
meta.description: Get a comprehensive AI-powered analysis of your app idea's market potential, feasibility, and viability

hero_title: Validate Your App Idea with AI
hero_description: Describe your app idea and our AI will analyze its market potential, technical feasibility, monetization strategies, and competition.
hero_subtitle: Our AI analyzes 4 critical dimensions of your idea and delivers a comprehensive viability report in under 60 seconds.
hero_trust: Free ¬∑ Instant Results ¬∑ No Credit Card Required
step1_helper: The more detail you provide, the better our AI can analyze your idea. Include what problem it solves, who it is for, and what makes it unique.

hero.title: Validate Your App Idea with AI
hero.subtitle: Get a comprehensive viability analysis in under 2 minutes

step1.title: Describe your app idea
step1.description: The more detail you provide, the better our analysis will be
step1.idea_placeholder: Example: An app that connects busy professionals with vetted meal prep chefs who deliver healthy, customized meals based on dietary preferences and health goals...
step1.min_chars: At least 30 characters for meaningful analysis

inspiration_label: Need inspiration? Try one of these:
inspiration_1_text: An AI-powered app that helps diabetic patients track blood sugar levels, predicts glucose spikes using machine learning, and connects them with nearby endocrinologists for virtual consultations.
inspiration_2_text: A hyperlocal delivery app for restaurants and grocery stores in Amman that uses AI route optimization, real-time GPS tracking, and dynamic pricing based on demand and distance.
inspiration_3_text: An adaptive learning platform for K-12 students in the Middle East that personalizes curriculum based on student performance, supports Arabic and English, and includes gamified assessments.
inspiration_4_text: A fitness app that uses phone camera and AI to analyze exercise form in real-time, generates personalized workout plans based on body goals, and integrates with local gym memberships in the GCC region.

score_interpretation.good: Good - Promising with some areas to refine
